reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made with a thick cotton-like material that's not thin or cheap, and appreciate its rich black color that looks expensive. The sweater is comfortable and not bulky, with one customer noting it's perfect for any occasion, while another mentions it sits at the hip. The size receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others find it too large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, nice looking cardigan
items.body: I love this cardigan! It is very light to wear but is nice and warm. It’s great for layering. The colour is a beautiful chocolate brown and is very flattering. It fits perfectly and is true to size. I’m really pleased the sleeves are a good length on my long arms! Read more
items.author: Mary Redcliffe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater. Love the fabric and cut.
items.body: I love this sweater.. it is 100% cotton which makes is much more durable than the ones made from synthetic materials. I have washed it a number of times in the wash machine and dried it on a hangar. It did fine. I do not know why it is called a jacket. It is a little longer than some of the other sweaters. This does not detract. It just covers the behind a little more. It is not extremely long, just a little bit. I did not even notice until I looked at measurements when I was going to order a new sweater. After studying other ones, I decided to reorder two of these. I love it for its appearance, washability and durability. Great sweater. Better than others. Read more
items.author: P.Scott

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small, Lay flat to dry.
items.body: Very nice cardigan, and the material feels nice, even after washing. However, I would not put this in the dryer, it will shrink considerably. The cardigan runs small, I am 5'6" and 115lbs and ordered a M. Read more
items.author: Sabrita Miller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I got this great addition to my wardrobe
items.body: Loved this cardigan, great fit, great colour the navy blue. Because it is cotton does kind of stretch out as you wear it. When air dried seemed to bounce back to more like the original size. Accidentally put it in the dryer and it shrank a little but it is still ok and fit me just fine. Would probably stick to air drying. It is a great value for the price I got it during prime day. The style is more modern of a sweater and it goes with a lot of things. Great thickness to add warmth when you need to layer. Read more
items.author: Mr. & Mrs. C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Fits well and is soft and comfortable Read more
items.author: S W

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bad packaging
items.body: This sweater is a nice quality sweater on its own. I liked the color and the material. But the problem is it came very tightly vacuum packed in plastic. When I opened it the buttons had imprinted on the sweater in various places because they had pressed so hard into the fabric for I don't know how long - how ever long it was packaged that way. Its not something you can iron out because its indented into the fabric now. I let it hang on a hanger for days hoping they might fall out or at least lessen. I tried massaging the spots a little to see if the fabric would spring back at all and fill in the indents. No luck with anything I've tried. Its really a disappointment because I like the sweater and was hoping to wear it with nicer outfits but it looks bad with the indented spots with the button imprint in random spots over the sweater. Too bad. I haven't worn it yet, but I may just wear it around the house now because I can't bring myself to wear it out like that. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s good quality & is soft & comfortable!
items.body: Loved it! Fit great & looked good with my tank top & jeans. Read more
items.author: Kris Hattendorf

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Accessorary for any Outfit
items.body: I love this sweater!!! The color my favorite. It is warm, and comfortable. It is perfect for being able to be used, to make different outfits, such as different colored slacks, skirts and dresses, and blouses. Read more
items.author: Kathy Lee

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Pink, Beige, Coralito, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
